meta.name: Andrew Lloyd Watkins
meta.valueStatement: I build teams where people actually want to work.
meta.description: Staff Engineer at Depot. Previously led teams through acquisitions at ServiceNow, EraDB, InfluxData. I build teams where people actually want to work.
